headline: HSBC shuffles MedTech stocks, cutting 4, upgrading 2
summary: Investing.com -- HSBC has reshuffled its ratings across the MedTech and Life Sciences sector, upgrading Siemens Healthineers AG (ETR:SHLG) and Sonova (SIX:SOON) to Buy while cutting Align Technology (NASDAQ:ALGN), Eurofins Scientific SE (EPA:EUFI), IQVIA, and Smith & Nephew (LON:SN) to Hold.

raw.headline: HSBC shuffles MedTech stocks, cutting 4, upgrading 2
raw.summary: Investing.com -- HSBC has reshuffled its ratings across the MedTech and Life Sciences sector, upgrading Siemens Healthineers AG (ETR:SHLG) and Sonova (SIX:SOON) to Buy while cutting Align Technology (NASDAQ:ALGN), Eurofins Scientific SE (EPA:EUFI), IQVIA, and Smith & Nephew (LON:SN) to Hold.

headline: 3 Healthcare Stocks That Concern Us
summary: Healthcare companies are pushing the status quo by innovating in areas like drug development and digital health. But speed bumps such as inventory destockings have persisted in the wake of COVID-19, and over the past six months, the industry has pulled back by 10.9%. This drawdown was worse than the S&P 500’s 5.7% decline.
